message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_RELATIONSHIPID
message.locale: Cannot reject as the appeal relationship ID has not been provided.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_REASONCODE
message.locale: Cannot reject as a reason for the appealed case rejection must be provided.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_USERNAME
message.locale: Cannot reject as the user who rejected the appealed case must be provided.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_DATE
message.locale: Cannot reject as the date on which the appealed case was rejected must be provided.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_REMOVED
message.locale: Cannot reject as the appealed case has being removed from the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_REJECTED
message.locale: Cannot reject as the appealed case has being rejected already.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Cannot reject as the appealed case has not being submitted for approval.

message.name: INF_APPEALED_CASE_REJECT_SUBJECT
message.locale: This appealed case has been rejected.

message.name: ERR_APPEALED_CASE_NOPARTICIPANT
message.locale: Cannot reject as there are no participants on this case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALED_CASE_MULTIPLEPARTICIPANTS
message.locale: Cannot reject as there are multiple participants on this case.
